sourceMeaningMnemonic: If there's a <radical>tsunami</radical> it's <radical>easy</radical> to get <kanji>hot water</kanji>. Just stick your hand out the window as the tsunami goes by and poof! That water's HOT.
meaningInfo: Picture the boiling hot tsunami water as it comes for you. Psh, this will be easy.
readingMnemonic: As the <kanji>hot water</kanji> comes, you just lift up the bottom of the <reading>yu</reading>rt (<ja>ゆ</ja>) you live in, and it comes flowing in. All of the cups, pots, and barrels you laid on your floor are now full of hot water.
readingInfo: You decided to live in a yurt because of the easy access it provides to hot water. They're so mobile!
